entry.summary:

entry.title: Monday night: A few showers. Low plus 5.
entry.summary: A few showers ending this evening then mainly cloudy. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 16 May 2016

entry.title: Tuesday: Mainly cloudy. High 14 except 10 along parts of the coast.
